post.author: 임기순
post.content:
Developer - Insurance systems Permanent full time role - Target base salary of 60-70K
Job Description:
Are you an experienced insurance technology professional driven to succeed? Are you looking for an entrepreneurial, fast-paced environment where you can apply your insurance and technical expertise?
Our client in Etobicoke is seeking a dynamic individual with a broad skill set in software application design and development to join an exciting development team on an industry-leading web-based policy administration suite. This work will be within a proprietary software and the position is an immediate need, the right person could start on Monday!
The ideal candidate will have the following qualifications:
- 5+ years of experience in insurance-related software development - Solid knowledge of insurance industry workflows and concepts (specifically P&C insurance) - Strong understanding of web application development principles and technologies (XML, HTML, JavaScript, .NET/Java, etc.) - Working knowledge of databases (SQL Server, Oracle, PostgreSQL) - Outstanding communication skills and ability to work effectively in a team environment
They offer a dynamic working environment with unparalelled opportunity for advancement as well as many perks including a company chef.
If you are interested or know someone suitable who may be please respond with resume and compensation expecations ASAP.
Reference # 33575
Lucas Robbins, Business Manager Hays Information Technology Suite 701, 201 City Centre Drive, Mississauga, ON L5B 2T4 T: 905 366 4527E: lrobbins@hays.ca
All introductions will be subject to our Terms of Business.
Specialist Recruitment hays.ca
post.title: Developer - Insurance systems (PERM)
